definition: to submit articles for publication/to contribute (writing)
to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

sentences.english: The professor often contributes articles to a literary journal .
sentences.chinese: 這位教授經常向一家文學雜誌投稿。

sentences.english: This impudent criticism was my first contribution to the Bharati.
sentences.chinese: 這篇狂妄的批評就是我第一次對《婆羅蒂》的投稿。

sentences.english: In addition, this web provides on-line servings of subscibe and contribution.
sentences.chinese: 另外，該網站還提供在線的訂閱和投稿。

sentences.english: Article submissions for posters were 52 communication.
sentences.chinese: 共有52篇投稿進行壁報交流。

sentences.english: If one cannot be readily identified, address your letter to the editor-in-chief.
sentences.chinese: 如果不能找到合適的編輯，可將投稿信寫給總編輯。

sentences.english: This message is generated by COREMAIL email system.
sentences.chinese: 投稿過後的回覆是系統退信。

sentences.english: He contributed to a literary journal.
that all editors of, and contributors to newspapers appearing in the German language must be members of the nation;
sentences.chinese: 凡以德文出版的報紙的編輯和投稿人必須是德國人。

sentences.english: Photo should be original taken by contributor.
sentences.chinese: 照片爲原始圖片，由投稿人本人拍攝。

sentences.english: Your contributions will be included in this project and in future columns.
sentences.chinese: 您的投稿將會在項目中或在未來的專欄裏出現。

sentences.english: My father often contributes to a literary journal.
sentences.chinese: 我的父親常在一個文學刊物上投稿。

sentences.english: Another source of this information is the journal's submission webpages.
sentences.chinese: 另外一個信息來源是雜誌的投稿網頁。

sentences.english: Take a few minutes now to leverage the information offered by last year's contributors.
sentences.chinese: 現在花幾分鐘時間重溫一下去年的投稿人提供的信息。

sentences.english: Use the slow period to take some time to write several guest articles for prominent blogs in your industry.
sentences.chinese: 利用這些空檔來爲當屬行業中的博客寫點文章投稿吧。

sentences.english: When it first came out it was dropped by the publisher.
sentences.chinese: 那本書第一次投稿被出版商丟到一邊去了。

sentences.english: The student has contributed to a literary journal.
sentences.chinese: 那位學生已經向文學雜誌投稿。

definition: the author takes sole responsibility for the views expressed here (disclaimer)
piece of writing submitted for publication/manuscript/article
fee paid to an author for a piece of writing
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]
chief editor (of newspaper)/abbr. for 總編輯|总编辑
